name: Aeronaut Tinkerer
oracle_text: This creature has flying as long as you control an artifact. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

name: Hylda of the Icy Crown
oracle_text:
Whenever you tap an untapped creature an opponent controls, you may pay {1}. When you do, choose one —
• Create a 4/4 white and blue Elemental creature token.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
• Scry 2, then draw a card.
printed_text:
Immer wenn du eine ungetappte Kreatur, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, tappst, kannst du {1} bezahlen. Wenn du dies tust, bestimme eines —
• Erzeuge einen 4/4 weißen und blauen Elementarwesen-Kreaturenspielstein.
• Lege auf jede Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, eine +1/+1-Marke.
• Hellsicht 2, ziehe dann eine Karte.

name: Ral, Monsoon Mage // Ral, Leyline Prodigy
type_line: Legendary Creature — Human Wizard // Legendary Planeswalker — Ral

card_faces.name: Ral, Monsoon Mage
card_faces.oracle_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell during your turn, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Ral deals 1 damage to you. If you win the flip, you may exile Ral. If you do, return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.

card_faces.name: Ral, Leyline Prodigy
card_faces.oracle_text:
Ral enters with an additional loyalty counter on him for each instant and sorcery spell you've cast this turn.
+1: Until your next turn, instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
−2: Ral deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card if you control a blue permanent other than Ral.
−8: Exile the top eight cards of your library. You may cast instant and sorcery spells from among them this turn without paying their mana costs.

name: Unbreakable Formation
oracle_text:
Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

name: Stealer of Secrets
oracle_text: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

name: White Orchid Phantom
oracle_text:
Flying, first strike
When this creature enters, destroy up to one target nonbasic land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Bloodthrone Vampire
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Kor Skyfisher
oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

name: Katara, the Fearless
oracle_text: If a triggered ability of an Ally you control triggers, that ability triggers an additional time.

name: Behold the Sinister Six!
oracle_text: Return up to six target creature cards with different names from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: None of them could defeat Spider-Man alone. Together, they would be unstoppable.

name: Chandra's Fury
oracle_text: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

name: Counterspell
flavor_text: "By the Hoary Hosts of Hoggoth, I deny you!"
